snippet.title: EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds - VR Escape Room (Vive, Rift, WMR)
snippet.description:
EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds is a VR escape room game for the Vive, Rift, and Windows Mixed Reality headsets. ▼ More information below ▼

 —
You find yourself trapped in a penthouse - in a mile high building which reaches above the clouds but is still partly under construction. Not everything seems to be working as expected... you might just have to do some construction work yourself, or even nick some equipment from that canceled base jump event on the roof... 
—

EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds is inspired by real-life escape games, makes full use of the room-scale virtual reality of the Vive and Oculus+Touch, and offers challenging puzzles you have to solve to escape the room. 
Can you escape? 
Find out more on the EscapeVR website: https://www.escapevr.net/

► Get it here:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/566970/EscapeVR_Above_the_Clouds/
Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/859122784213043/
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/de-de/p/escape-vr-above-the-clouds/9mv21dv13803
Viveport: https://www.viveport.com/apps/22f060f9-4bda-4084-868c-66ee72e4cda9

Thanks and have fun!


EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds is developed by Sourcenity: http://www.sourcenity.com/
